Name: Custom Language Highlighting
Description: By using the WordTaggerBase as a base, you can create custom syntax highlighting for any custom language. In this article we will create basic highlighting for the Python programming language.
KeyWords: Custom Language Highlighting, custom, language, highlighting, radsyntaxeditor, python

Name: Drag and Drop Text from TreeView

ExampleInfo.Name: Drag and Drop Text from TreeView

Description: This example demonstrates how to drag and drop text onto the RadSyntaxEditor control from a RadTreeView instance.
KeyWords: Drag and Drop Text from TreeView, drag, drop, text, radsyntaxeditor, radtreeview, snippets

Name: Multiline Comments in DAX
Description: This example demonstrates how you can implement a custom tagger for the DAX language which can handle multiline comments.
KeyWords: Multiline Comments in DAX, multiline, comments, custom, language, dax, highlighting, radsyntaxeditor
